statements: UPDATE STEM_Projects SET project_name = 'Project A', progress = 50 WHERE project_id = 1;

UPDATE STEM_Projects SET progress = 50 WHERE project_id = 1;

UPDATE Projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated Project Description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Competitions SET competition_location = 'New Location', competition_date = '2023-06-15' WHERE competition_id = 2;
UPDATE Projects SET project_description = 'New project description', project_end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;

UPDATE projects SET project_status = 'In Progress' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE competitions SET location = 'New Location', end_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE competition_id = 3;
UPDATE projects SET project_status='Completed', project_description='Finalized project details' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE competitions SET location='New Venue', organizer='New Organizer' WHERE competition_id=3;

UPDATE Students SET school_name = 'New School', grade_level = 12 WHERE student_id = 5;

UPDATE Students SET student_grade = 12, student_school = 'High School XYZ' WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE STEM_Projects SET project_description = 'New description for Project 1', project_category = 'Engineering', project_status = 'completed' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Winners SET prize = 'First Place' WHERE competition_id = 3 AND project_id = 2 AND student_id = 4;
